nodes.bodyText:
having a script on install can cause npm to fail before generating the node_modules folder.
Having this as postinstall ensures install can happen and succeed or fail independently of these copy tasks.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,11 +2,8 @@

   "private": true,
   "scripts": {
-    "install": "cross-env-shell \"./coursier bootstrap com.geirsson:scalafmt-cli_2.12:1.5.1 -f -o node_modules/.bin/scalafmt && ./coursier bootstrap com.google.googlejavaformat:google-java-format:1.7 -f -o node_modules/.bin/google-java-format\"",
-    "format-commit:scala": "git-format-staged -f \"scalafmt --stdin --assume-filename \\\"{}\\\"\" \"*.scala\" \"*.sbt\"",
-    "format-commit:java": "git-format-staged -f \"google-java-format --assume-filename \\\"{}\\\" -\" \"*.java\"",
+    "postinstall": "cross-env-shell \"./coursier bootstrap com.geirsson:scalafmt-cli_2.12:1.5.1 -f -o node_modules/.bin/scalafmt && ./coursier bootstrap com.google.googlejavaformat:google-java-format:1.7 -f -o node_modules/.bin/google-java-format\"",
